title: Blended Education Based on Self-Directed Learning for Accounting Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or advanced accounting theories and practical experience
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning enhancement program utilizing digital devices for current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can integrate textual and graphical information from accounting data to produce analytical reports.
Learners successfully resolve over 80% of accounting problems by applying self-regulated learning strategies.
Learners can restructure accounting data using digital tools and visualize complex financial information.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
